trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> routed events.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para los eventos enrutados <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> y <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> represents the method that implements the command logic of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> representa el método que implementa la lógica de comando de un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types and enables the centralization of command logic.
trans-unit.target: Separar la lógica de implementación del comando permite que el comando que se debe invocar desde diferentes orígenes y tipos y permite la centralización de la lógica de comandos.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is also used for <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase de datos de evento también se utiliza para <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: But most practical handlers will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> events from a particular <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, rather than work at the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> level.
trans-unit.target: Pero los controladores más prácticos controlarán la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> eventos de un determinado <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, en lugar de trabajo en el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> nivel.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los comandos, consulte [Información general sobre los comandos](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> that opens a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> when the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que abre un <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> cuando se ejecuta el comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el comando invocado.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Comando asociado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the event can be cast to the specific implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, if the type is known.
trans-unit.target: El comando asociado con el evento se puede convertir a la implementación específica de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, como un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, si se conoce el tipo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> that handles multiple commands.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que controla varios comandos.

trans-unit.source: The handler checks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs> to determine which method to call.
trans-unit.target: Las comprobaciones de controlador la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Command%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs> para determinar qué método se debe llamar.

trans-unit.source: Gets data parameter of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el parámetro de datos del comando.

trans-unit.source: The command-specific data.
trans-unit.target: Datos específicos del comando.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This property represents a generic data parameter that is defined by the particular command.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad representa un parámetro de datos genérico que se define mediante el comando concreto.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is not needed, `null` can be passed.
trans-unit.target: Si este parámetro no es necesario, `null` se pueden pasar.

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A> is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A> se utiliza para pasar información concreta al comando cuando se ejecuta.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de los datos se define mediante el comando.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> for a custom <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> para un personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: The handler updates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> with the current time and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control that is passed to the handler through the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Las actualizaciones de controlador un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> con la hora actual y la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control que se pasa al controlador a través de la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
